question: What is the theme of the 2019 edition of World Day to Combat Desertification and Drought (WDCDD)?
option1: Combating land degradation for sustainable agriculture
option2: The Beauty of Deserts – The Challenge of Desertification
option4: Social Dimensions of Desertification: Migration and Poverty
explanation: The World Day to Combat Desertification and Drought (WDCDD) is observed every year  on 17th of June to promote public awareness of international efforts to combat desertification. The day is a unique moment to remind everyone that land degradation neutrality is achievable through problem-solving, strong community involvement and co-operation at all levels. The 2019 theme is “Let’s Grow the Future Together”.
